title: A sermon preached at Flitton in the countie of Bedford at the funerall of the Right Honourable Henrie Earle of Kent, the sixteenth of March 1614. By I.B. D.D.
author: Bowle, John, d. 1637.
publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Richard Woodroffe, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Golden Key, neere the great north dore,
notes: Running title reads: A sermon at the funerall of the Earle of Kent.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
